document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Bobolink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Rowdy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Meadow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">swaggers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Presbyterian </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">resume </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Meeting </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">gaily </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">interrupted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">overflowing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Day </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">opening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Sabbath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">afflictive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Way </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">bowed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">instead </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Earth </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">shouted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">pray </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The bobolink is gone - the rowdy of the meadow
